data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 99,300 citizens of Kilkenny, Ireland, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kilkenny, Ireland
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Kilkenny, Ireland to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 64 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Kilkenny will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,544 believers in the state of Kilkenny.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Kilkenny, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Kilkenny that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Kilkenny to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kilkenny, Ireland has a population of 99,300.

We estimate Kilkenny has 1,544 people who might know Jesus, 89,223 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 8,534 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 64 neighbors who need Jesus.
